review: Didn't know what to expect but I love it.  I signed up for Prime aslo but saw little advantage to me because every movie I wanted to watch I had to rent. Didn't like that, netflex seemed a better deal at $7.99 a month with a better selection of free movies.  Had no use for 2 day shipping, music, or watching movies on my computer.  Movies that have been on cable for a month now was free and prime charged $3.99 , not good for me.
author: Peter Zguzenski

review: Wow great video quality...  Amazon prime all the way, great video quality, great family and kid friendly choices.  I also have xbmc installed, so we can watch our backed up move vea network.  Router with usb port that is.  Great pics, you can push video and pics from other devices.  Amazon has great apps, that are user friendly, work well with tv box and there remote.  Setup was to easy....  Get prime account, a no Brainerd.  You get free video, movies and shows with prime, and also free shipping on 99 % of things you buy on amazon.  I even got mom 1 of these.  I also have setup fire tv for a few of our friends and family.
author: James G.

review: I would give it five stars if it had a way to control picture quality or bandwidth usage. If you have a limited amount of monthly data usage, it would be nice to be able to reduce the amount it uses. The picture quality is excellent, even at a reduced rate, which I am having to do through my router.
